T02D1228:34a-1: shr'i he badzra ho ma bi dhi /
T02D1228:34a-3: dpal kye rdo rje las sbyin sreg gi cho ga /
T02D1228:34a-4: kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1228:34a-6: lha mo dang bcas 'khor lo la //
T02D1228:34a-7: phyag 'tshal nas ni sbyin sreg gi //
T02D1228:34a-8: rim pa yang dag bshad par bya //
T02D1228:34a-9: rgyal bas bya ba'i rgyud las ni //
T02D1228:34a-10: las ni rnam pa bzhir gsungs pa /
T02D1228:34a-11: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang mngon spyod //
T02D1228:34a-12: de yi rim pa ma nor bar //
T02D1228:34a-13: mdor bsdus rim pa bshad par bya //
T02D1228:34a-14: zhal bsro cho ga bya ba la //
T02D1228:34a-15: rgyas pa'i las ni mchog yin te /
T02D1228:34a-16: rgyas nas brtsams te las rnams kyi //
T02D1228:34a-17: rim pa rab tu bshad par bya //
T02D1228:34a-18: me thab rim pa bshad bya ste /
T02D1228:34a-19: rgyas pa pa la ni gru bzhi pa //
T02D1228:34a-20: zhi ba la ni zlum por 'dod //
T02D1228:34a-21: dbang la gzhu yi dbyibs can te //
T02D1228:34a-22: gsod pa la ni gru gsum shis //
T02D1228:34a-23: yang na las kun byed pa'i mchog / khru gang dang ni khru do nyid //
T02D1228:34a-25: khru gang dang ni de yi phyed //
T02D1228:34a-27: gzhu la bzhi bcu nyi shu kha //
T02D1228:34a-28: zabs su sor bcu dbang gi yin //
T02D1228:34a-29: ngos gsum sor ni nyi shu la //
T02D1228:34a-30: zabs su de phyed gsod la 'dod //
T02D1228:34a-31: rgyas pa kha dog ser po ste //
T02D1228:34a-32: zhi ba dkar por shes par bya //
T02D1228:34a-33: dbang la dmar por rab tu grags //
T02D1228:34a-34: de bzhin gsod la nag por 'dod//
T02D1228:34b-0: @34b dgug pa'i las ni dbang du bya //
T02D1228:34b-1: mngon spyod du ni zhe sdang sogs //
T02D1228:34b-2: rgyas pa dbus su rin chen te //
T02D1228:34b-3: shar du rdo rje lhor 'khor lo //
T02D1228:34b-4: nub tu padma ral gri byang //
T02D1228:34b-5: sor bzhi 'gyed par byas pa'i phyir //
T02D1228:34b-6: kha khyer sor bzhi rdo rjes bskor //
T02D1228:34b-7: phyi rol sor bzhi por la yang //
T02D1228:34b-8: padma'i phreng ba gtang bar bya //
T02D1228:34b-9: zhi ba'i phyag mtshan rim pa yang //
T02D1228:34b-10: dbus su 'khor lo shar rdo rje //
T02D1228:34b-11: lho ru rin chen nub padma //
T02D1228:34b-12: byang du ral gri shes par bya //
T02D1228:34b-14: dbang gi phyag mtshan rim bshad bya //
T02D1228:34b-15: kha khyer spyi dang mthun pa ste //
T02D1228:34b-16: dbus la rdo rje rab dang /
T02D1228:34b-18: phyi ma spyir mthun dmar pos byug / mngon spyod mtshan nyid bshad bya ste //
T02D1228:34b-19: kha khyer sor gsum rdo rjes bskor //
T02D1228:34b-20: dbus su ral gri phyi ma ni //
T02D1228:34b-21: bla ma'i zhal shes nag pos byug / rgyas pa shar du bltas la bya /
T02D1228:34b-22: zhi ba la ni byang du 'dod /
T02D1228:34b-23: dbang dang bskrad pa nub tu 'dod //
T02D1228:34b-24: drag po'i las la lho ru'o //
T02D1228:34b-25: rgyas pa la ni nang par bya //
T02D1228:34b-26: zhi ba nyi ma phyed na'o //
T02D1228:34b-27: dbang ni nyi nub nam phyed drag / ces gang gsungs pa ni me thab kyi rim pa'o //
T02D1228:34b-28: mchod rdzas sreg rdzas rim zhes bya //
T02D1228:34b-29: sngags mkhan g-yon du dri me tog / dung phor bkang ba gzhag par bya //
T02D1228:34b-30: yon chab snod ni gser la sogs //
T02D1228:34b-31: chu dang me tog gis bkad gzhag / med na sa las byas pa'ang rung //
T02D1228:34b-32: shing ni mi shes spang bar bya //
T02D1228:34b-33: dgang gzar blugs gzar mar mdun du //
T02D1228:34b-34: g-yas su dris bkang snod du ni //
T02D1228:34b-35: ku sha bcug la gzhag par bya //
T02D1228:34b-36: las kun byed pa'i bum pa yang //
T02D1228:34b-37: tshul bzhin du ni gzhag par bya //
T02D1228:34b-38: 'byung po'i gtor ma mchog kyang gzhag / til sogs
T02D1228:34b-39: sreg rdzas rim bzhin gzhag / rgyas la zho dang
T02D1228:34b-40: zhi la til // dbang dang dgug la autpala dmar //
T02D1228:34b-41: drag po la sogs tsher can shing //
T02D1228:34b-42: phyi ma 'og nas bshad pa bzhin //
T02D1228:34b-43: thog mar mar dang tha mar mar //
T02D1228:34b-44: mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas kyi rim pa'o //
T02D1228:34b-45: de rnams byin gyis brlab pa ni //
T02D1228:34b-46: rdo rjes rag pa de nyid ni //
T02D1228:34b-47: brjod pas dri ma dag nas ni //
T02D1228:34b-48: nyi ma'i shel ltar dag par bsam //
T02D1228:35a-2: rlon shing 'dab bcas rtse las byung //
T02D1228:35a-3: srid du mdzub gang sbom chag gang //
T02D1228:35a-4: sbrang rtsi dang ni mar gyis byug / tsandan dkar po'i chu la spangs //
T02D1228:35a-5: rtse gcig zhi ba'i las la dbul //
T02D1228:35a-6: srid du khru gang sboms su ni //
T02D1228:35a-7: chag gang pa ni rab tu bzang /
T02D1228:35a-8: yal ga dbus kyi cha las byung //
T02D1228:35a-9: zho dang mar dang ser po'i dris //
T02D1228:35a-10: spangs pa rtse gcig rgyas pa la'o //
T02D1228:35a-11: sor lnga 'dab bcas sbom chag gang //
T02D1228:35a-12: yungs mar bdud rtsi lnga la sogs //
T02D1228:35a-13: spangs pa dbang gi las la shis //
T02D1228:35a-14: srid du sor bzhi tsher ma can //
T02D1228:35a-15: mi rus dur khrod thal chen dang //
T02D1228:35a-16: dug la sogs pa'i chus spangs pa'o //
T02D1228:35a-17: mngon spyod dag la dbul bar rigs //
T02D1228:35a-19: de nas bud shing rim pa bshad //
T02D1228:35a-20: p'a la sha dang n+ya gro sogs //
T02D1228:35a-21: las kyi rjes su mthun par bya //
T02D1228:35a-22: yang na 'o ma can shing mchog / de yang las dang rjes mthun bya //
T02D1228:35a-23: bud shing rim pa mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1228:35a-24: de nas slob dpon phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pas /
T02D1228:35a-25: bla ma mchod pa nas brtsams te /
T02D1228:35a-32: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod /
T02D1228:35a-35: bdag gzi byin bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1228:35a-36: de nas rdzas rnams thams cad la /
T02D1228:35a-37: bsang gtor lan gsum byas nas su //
T02D1228:35a-38: las dang rjes mthun me blangs nas //
T02D1228:35a-39: rlung yab kyis ni sbar bar bya //
T02D1228:35a-40: spar ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te //
T02D1228:35a-41: aom dzv'a la dzv'a la h'um phat /
T02D1228:35a-42: mang brjod legs par sbar nas ni //
T02D1228:35a-43: thab khung bud shing brdzangs pa la //
T02D1228:35a-44: gzhung bzhin du ni me gzhug go //
T02D1228:35a-45: mar gyis gzi byin bskyed byas la //
T02D1228:35a-46: dge dang mi dge'i mtshan brtag go //
T02D1228:35a-48: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a //
T02D1228:35a-49: 'dis ni ku sha byin brlabs nas //
T02D1228:35a-50: shar du rtse bstan dang po yin //
T02D1228:35a-51: lho dang nub byang de bzhin rtse //
T02D1228:35a-52: bstan te bkram pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1228:35a-53: ku sha dgram pa'i rim pa mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1228:35a-54: sngon du bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1228:35b-0: nam mkha'i @35b khams su bha ga bsam //
T02D1228:35b-1: dbus su h'um bskyed mchod rten bsam //
T02D1228:35b-2: las dang rjes su mthun pa yi //
T02D1228:35b-3: de yi dbus su thab khung bsam //
T02D1228:35b-4: dbus su bam bskyed padma la //
T02D1228:35b-5: de dbus nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02D1228:35b-6: de steng mngon par byang chub pas //
T02D1228:35b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum bsgom //
T02D1228:35b-9: 'od las h'um dang ram du gyur //
T02D1228:35b-10: de gyur ma lha yab yum bsam //
T02D1228:35b-11: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i mdog / zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa //
T02D1228:35b-13: g-yas na gundhe mchog sbyin bsnams //
T02D1228:35b-14: g-yon na se'u 'bru bgrang phreng mtha' //
T02D1228:35b-15: gsus 'dir ral pa'i dbu rgyan can //
T02D1228:35b-16: rigs bdag cod pan mchod phyir thogs //
T02D1228:35b-17: de yi thugs kar bsam pa ni //
T02D1228:35b-18: sna tshogs pad steng gru gsum me //
T02D1228:35b-19: de yi steng du h'um dang dza: //
T02D1228:35b-20: lce la yi ge ram bsam mo //
T02D1228:35b-21: bsang gtor nas brtsams phyag 'tshal sogs //
T02D1228:35b-22: de la mchod pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1228:35b-23: dam tshig sems dpa'i me lha'i rim pa'o //
T02D1228:35b-24: aom aagna ye ma h'a te dza /
T02D1228:35b-25: sarba karm'a bra s'a dha ka /
T02D1228:35b-26: ka ru ni kri ta sarba /
T02D1228:35b-27: a'asmin sanni hi tv'a bha ba ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa'o //
T02D1228:35b-28: rang gi mdun du bltas nas ni /
T02D1228:35b-29: bsang gtor nas brtsams phyag 'tshal mtha' //
T02D1228:35b-30: phyag nas rab tu bstim par bya //
T02D1228:35b-31: sngags 'dis dgyes par bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1228:35b-32: sarb'a n+yee par than tsa si ti ham ga tsa ha bya ba ka /
T02D1228:35b-33: aa ka mu ye tha ka le /
T02D1228:35b-34: sarba siddhi ku ru sha me me dza:h'um bam ho: //
T02D1228:35b-35: bka' lung gis gar dang ldan par bskul bar bya /
T02D1228:35b-36: goo r'i lcags kyus bkug nas ni /
T02D1228:35b-37: tsoo r'i ma yis zhags pas gzhug / lcags sgrog gis bsdams be t'a l'i //
T02D1228:35b-38: dril bus mnyes byed ghasma r'i //
T02D1228:35b-39: gnyis su med par bstims nas ni //
T02D1228:35b-40: bsang gtor nas brtsams mchod pa dbul //
T02D1228:35b-41: dam tshig gi me lha la ye shes kyi me lha gzhug pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1228:35b-42: de nas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i sgrub pa pos rgyud rnams bsgoms nas ni /
T02D1228:35b-43: gzar bu gnyis kyi nang du ni /
T02D1228:35b-44: yi dam lha yi sa bon bsam //
T02D1228:35b-45: gru mo gnyis sprad gzar bu bdun //
T02D1228:35b-46: so so'i las dang mthun par dbul //
T02D1228:35b-47: rgyas dang zhi ba pushtim dang //
T02D1228:35b-48: sh'antim ku ru zhes pas dbul //
T02D1228:36a-2: sha tr'um ma ras dbul bar bya //
T02D1228:36a-3: de ni dbul ba'i rim pa bshad par bya ste //
T02D1228:36a-4: aom na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D1228:36a-7: aagna ye pushtim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-9: gzhan ni blugs gzar gyis dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1228:36a-10: aom sarba sam ba de sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-12: aom sarba p'a pim da ha na badzra ya aa
T02D1228:36a-13: mu kam bya sarba p'a bam da ha na sv'a
T02D1228:36a-15: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-17: aom badzr'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-19: aom badzr'a pra ti ha ta badzra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-21: aom badzra ba dzi ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-23: aom badzra ma h'a be ga ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-25: aom ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-27: aom badzra ghasma ri sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-29: yam shing dbul ba'i rim pa ni /
T02D1228:36a-30: aom ya dzny'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-32: aom bo dhi bri ksh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-34: aom badzra na da th'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-36: aom badzra ha sa ka r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1228:36a-38: de nas aagna ye pushtim ku ru zhes pas mar
T02D1228:36a-39: dgang gzar khengs pa stong yan chad dbul bar bya'o
T02D1228:36a-40: // de nas bsang gtor nas brtsams te /
T02D1228:36a-41: mchod nas me lha la bstod pa bya /
T02D1228:36a-42: rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yis //
T02D1228:36a-43: srid pa'i rang bzhin tshigs bcad brjod /
T02D1228:36a-44: de yan chad ni me lha mchod pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1228:36a-45: de nas las kun byed pa'i chus //
T02D1228:36a-46: me lha bsang gtor thugs ka ru //
T02D1228:36a-48: las dang rjes mthun me zhal thab //
T02D1228:36a-49: bsangs nas de ru dbul bar bya //
T02D1228:36a-52: bsang gtor nas brtsams mchod pa dbul //
T02D1228:36a-53: mchod bstod bdud rtsi mthar thug bya //
T02D1228:36a-54: de nas mar gzar nyi shu rtsa gcig yan chad dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1228:36a-55: de nas zho la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams phul la /
T02D1228:36a-56: mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya'am stong la brgyad kyis btags pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1228:36a-57: bsang gtor nas brtsams mar gyis mchod //
T02D1228:36a-58: bstod de phyag 'tshal gshegs su gsol //
T02D1228:36a-59: rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yis //
T02D1228:36a-60: rang bzhin dag gi tshig bcad brjod //
T02D1228:36b-0: @36b yi ge brgya bas bzod par gsol //
T02D1228:36b-1: mtha' ru mu: btags snying gar bsdu //
T02D1228:36b-2: lha yi sbyin sreg gi rim pa'o //
T02D1228:36b-3: de nas blugs gzar 'ba' zhig gis //
T02D1228:36b-4: lhag nas me lha'i mchod par bya //
T02D1228:36b-7: de nas rdzas kun phul ba dang /
T02D1228:36b-8: dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni //
T02D1228:36b-9: de nas slob mas me tog bor //
T02D1228:36b-10: las dang mthun pa'i legs par brjod //
T02D1228:36b-13: shantim ku ru zhi ba la /
T02D1228:36b-14: rgyas pa pushtim pa sham dbang //
T02D1228:36b-15: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i dus su rnal 'byor
T02D1228:36b-16: pas bya ba'i rim pa ni 'di dag yin te
T02D1228:36b-17: / dang por thab khung gi bye brag bya ba dang /
T02D1228:36b-19: mtshan ma bri ba dang dus dang phyogs dang /
T02D1228:36b-21: rdzas byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1228:36b-23: yam shing gi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1228:36b-24: bud shing gi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1228:36b-25: me spar ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1228:36b-27: thab khung byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1228:36b-28: der dam tshig gi me lha bskyed pa dang /
T02D1228:36b-29: de la ye shes kyi me lha spyan drang ba dang /
T02D1228:36b-31: yang der bdag nyid kyi lha'i 'khor lo bskyed pa dang /
T02D1228:36b-32: de la ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug gzhug bya ba dang /
T02D1228:36b-33: der dgang blugs la sogs pa dbul ba dang /
T02D1228:36b-34: mchod pa la sogs pa phul la /
T02D1228:36b-35: ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol te /
T02D1228:36b-36: dam tshig gi 'khor lo bsdu ba dang /
T02D1228:36b-37: yang me lha la mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1228:36b-38: ye shes kyi lha bskul ba dang /
T02D1228:36b-39: dam tshig gi me lha bsdus la /
T02D1228:36b-40: rdzas lhag mas sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1228:36b-41: bdag nyid ci bder gnas par bya'o //
T02D1228:36b-42: mngon spyod la ni m'a ra ya //
T02D1228:36b-43: mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D1228:36b-44: me lha'i mchod pa byas nas ni //
T02D1228:36b-45: mchod pa'i zhal bsil gong ma bzhin //
T02D1228:36b-46: so rtsi na bza' la sogs pas //
T02D1228:36b-47: me lha mnyes par byas nas ni //
T02D1228:36b-48: rang bzhin dag pa'i tshigs bcad brjod //
T02D1228:36b-49: me lha nam mkhar gshegs su gsol //
T02D1228:36b-50: me lha'i mchod pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1228:36b-51: zab mo'i don ni man ngag yin pas 'dir ma bstan //
T02D1228:36b-52: kye yi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i //
T02D1228:36b-53: sbyin sreg rim pa gsal byed pas //
T02D1228:36b-54: dge ba thob pa gang yin des //
T02D1228:37a-0: myur bar sems can grol gyur @37a * //
T02D1228:37a-1: cig / sbyin sreg gi cho ga mdor bsdus pa //
T02D1228:37a-2: slob dpon po dhi garbhas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1228:37a-4: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka m'a la shr'i dang /
